main event: A civilian observed an object with an S/C shape, bluish with a green glow in Salt Lake City on June 10, 1958.
interesting points: The object was seen for a few seconds before disappearing behind trees., The object's movement was initially from east to west before making a 180-degree turn., There were two jet aircraft in the area during the sighting., The sighting was categorized as probably a balloon or astronomical phenomenon., The observer had direct visual of the object at all times.
sighted object: object shaped like an S/C, bluish with green glow
